name: Auto-fix eligible - simple typo fix
description: Typo in documentation should be auto-fixable with high score

input.title: Typo in README: 'teh' should be 'the'
input.body:
## Description
In the README.md file, line 42, there's a typo:

> "This is teh best library"

Should be:
> "This is the best library"
